plot: A teacher asks her class, "What do you want to be when you grow up?". While his joyful classmates respond, Tom, a quiet 10-year-old boy, slips away.
title: Vivre
plot_es: A teacher asks her class, "What do you want to be when you grow up?". While his joyful classmates respond, Tom, a quiet 10-year-old boy, slips away.
plot_en: A teacher asks her class, "What do you want to be when you grow up?". While his joyful classmates respond, Tom, a quiet 10-year-old boy, slips away.
